meanings.definition: Showing signs of insanity or irrational behavior.
meanings.sent1: The man's behavior became nutsier as he rambled on about aliens.
meanings.sent2: Her nutsier actions worried her friends.
meanings.sent3: The nutsier squirrel kept trying to bury its acorn in the sand at the beach.
meanings.sent4: The nutsier idea of flying to the moon on a paper airplane seemed more appealing as the day went on.
meanings.sent5: The nutsier behavior of the clown made the children laugh uncontrollably.

meanings.definition: More crazy or eccentric than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The haunted house looked even nutsier with the addition of fake spiders and cobwebs.
meanings.sent2: His nutsier outfit made him stand out at the party.
meanings.sent3: The nutsier hat she wore had a giant feather sticking out of it.
meanings.sent4: The nutsier car in the parking lot was covered in colorful polka dots.
meanings.sent5: The nutsier painting in the gallery caught everyone's attention with its vibrant colors.
